definition: stringed instruments that are played with a bow, add as if on a string
details:
noun
- stringed instruments that are played with a bow
= example: stringed instruments that are played with a bow
= synonyms: bowed stringed instrument
- a necklace made by a stringing objects together
= example: a necklace made by a stringing objects together
= synonyms: chain, strand
- a tie consisting of a cord that goes through a seam around an opening
= example: a tie consisting of a cord that goes through a seam around an opening
= synonyms: drawstring, drawing string
- a lightweight cord
= synonyms: twine
- a tightly stretched cord of wire or gut, which makes sound when plucked, struck, or bowed
- a collection of objects threaded on a single strand
- a linear sequence of symbols, characters, words, or phrases
= example: a linear sequence of symbols, characters, words, or phrases
- a sequentially ordered set of things or events or ideas in which each successive member is related to the preceding
= example: a sequentially ordered set of things or events or ideas in which each successive member is related to the preceding
= synonyms: train
- (cosmology) a hypothetical one-dimensional subatomic particle having a concentration of energy and the dynamic properties of a flexible loop
- a tough piece of fiber in vegetables, meat, or other food (especially the tough fibers connecting the two halves of a bean pod)
verb
- add as if on a string
= example: add as if on a string
= synonyms: string up
- provide with strings
= example: provide with strings
- thread on or as if on a string
= example: thread on or as if on a string
= synonyms: draw
- remove the stringy parts of
= example: remove the stringy parts of
- string together
= example: string together
- stretch out or arrange like a string
- move or come along
= synonyms: string along
